attributes.action: Stop inVerstment in Burma and support The Freedom Democracy Movement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For more than ten years the British government has refused to ban new
investment in Burma, despite repeated requests from Burma¹s democracy
movement. The regime in Burma has used foreign investment to double the size
of the army, reinforcing its grip on power, while ordinary people have
become poorer.


Therefore I urge The government  immediately ban new investment in Burma via the BritishVirgin Islands and other Overseas Territories. (The government can do this using a mechanism called a Queens Order in Council)

Also ask the Prime Minister to introduce legislation that will also enable the
government to ban British companies from investing in Burma (Labour is the
only major political party in the UK that does not support a unilateral
investment ban).
